articles.title: US forces said to strike alleged drug boat in the Pacific - BBC
articles.description: This is the eighth US strike on alleged drug trafficking vessels near Latin America, the first on the Pacific side.
articles.content:
Bernd Debusmann Jrat the White House
US forces have struck another vessel alleged to be carrying drugs, this time in the waters of the Pacific Ocean, the Pentagon has confirmed. 
According to defen… [+3059 chars]
